text: 1.8: Kis 22.28; 2 Pi 2.10Mba zav nden vhen zergi gumgi, mbe nde ndɨkndɨgi ŋgɨr zav zegi. Mbe kha khesharigi tɨvi zɨn vui ntɨɨri ma. Mbe mbarkɨrga rɨɨa kuim, nta mbe ndɨkndɨgi khavim, mbe tɨvi mbatɨgi guarira wari won fhavi ga mbui. Mbe maaŋ mbuav, vhɨra nza Guma Bakɨme ga rɨɨrɨɨv, mbe vhɨra Fhe Bakɨmen enserir, mbe buni mbatɨgir mbe nzuai.
